EmailTemplate.name: DPS - Protera™ Iinformation and Manufacturers Apparel made of Protera™
EmailTemplate.subject: Protera™ Information and Manufacturers of Apparel made of Protera™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Protera™.
High value. Light weight. More comfort. Safety comes first. DuPont™ Protera® is compliant with NFPA 70E Category 2 requirements. Which means when used properly, you are protected against the heat of electric arc exposure.
Please visit our DuPont website to learn more about Protera and where to buy. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/personal-protective-equipment/thermal-protective/brands/protera.html
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=16&prodNum=16
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
